SIGN_IN_DESCRIPTION: Please sign in to continue to your dashboard.

UNAUTHORIZED.TITLE: Access Denied
UNAUTHORIZED.SUBTITLE: Authentication Required
UNAUTHORIZED.MESSAGE: You need to sign in to access this resource. Please authenticate with your Microsoft account.

FORBIDDEN.TITLE: Access Forbidden
FORBIDDEN.SUBTITLE: Insufficient Permissions
FORBIDDEN.MESSAGE: You don't have permission to access this resource. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.

ERRORS.SERVICE_OFFLINE: Service is offline, wait for few minutes or contact administrator.
ERRORS.AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED: You are not authenticated. Please relog and try again.
ERRORS.NO_PERMISSION: You don't have permission to access this resource.
ERRORS.METHOD_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Endpoint exists but method [GET/PUT/POST/DELETE] is not implemented in api service.

UPDATE.NEW_VERSION_MESSAGE: A new version of the application is available. Click OK to update now.
UPDATE.RELOAD_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: The application needs to be reloaded to apply updates.
UPDATE.NO_UPDATE_MESSAGE: You are using the latest version of the application.
UPDATE.UPDATE_CHECK_FAILED: Failed to check for updates. Please try again later.
